page.title: 03A typical day in my life
page.content:
This morning i woke up at 7.45 to go to school. I got ready and went down stairs for my breakfast. Once I had finished my breakfast, I brushed my hair and went to school with Catherine. When I got to school, Mrs.Thomas took the register and we lined up to go down to the hall,where the radio broadcast was on. When we came out,we all went back to the classroom to do some work. At playtime,we all went out onto the field. The whistle went and went to do my prefects duty.Then we came inside and carried on with S.M.P.(maths) which we do nearly every day. Later,we did local studies and played rounders. When I got home I had my tea and at 7.30 I watched T.V until bedtime.
by Jenny Ramsey, aged 11
